cast.name: 路易斯·布兰多尼 Luis Brandoni

introduction: Rodolfo is a doctor who has just retired. Since widowed, a few years ago, he lives alone in his house. His only family is his daughter Laura, who he barely speaks to. An unexpected event makes Laura move for a few days with his father. This coexistence will be bring out old arguments, unresolved quarrels and wounds that have never healed. Both will have the opportunity to speak again. This will help Rodolfo realize that there's still time to recover the lost time.
